alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Muskogee; Okmulgee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 12:55AM CDT until April 16 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma... West central Muskogee County in east central Oklahoma... Southern Okmulgee County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 1254 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Schulter, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations in or near the path include... Henryetta... Checotah... Dewar... Schulter... Grayson... Council Hill... Hoffman... Hitchita... Pierce... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 249 and 265. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
